[b][color=white][url=https://snipta.com]Snipta the Crypto Currency Calculator[/url][/color][/b] 
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/url] has introduced a new Preev alternative after finding Preev, although is used by many, lacks a number of coins that seem to be standard. The site "was designed by [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1290620]Designer[/url], mostly coded by [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2525478]TyrantKingBen[/url]." A screenshot of the site can be found below.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5649317] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[spoiler][img]https://i.gyazo.com/2997dc6bc103f1817b3f69106db77bd0.png[/img][/spoiler]

[b][color=white]Blocks and Less of Them[/color][/b] 
New policies have recently been implemented on Hack Forums, lifting many blocks that prevented users from accessing the site with VPNs and users from certain countries. We will now be seeing new members from China, Russia which have been blocked since 2010. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5642995] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=white][b]Awards[/b][/color] [list]
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=96230][color=#00AAFF][b]Panik[/b][/color][/url] has received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=37][b]Cuddly and Cute[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/cute.png[/img] award. 
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3593457][color=#99FF00][b]Courage The Dog[/b][/color][/url] has received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=77][b]Top Banana[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/topbanana.png[/img] award. 
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2543360][color=#00AAFF][b]scorpi0n[/b][/color][/url] donated for [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=80][b]Grand Amethyst[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/grand.png[/img] and subsequently received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=20][b]Black Hatter[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/gumshoe_24.png[/img] & [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=12][b]Flamer[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/fire_24.png[/img] award. 
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=white][b]Kill Joy[/b][/color][/url] has received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=30][b]Bronze Tutorial Award[/b][/url].
[/list]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/0qvJQVz.png[/img][/align]

[list][b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5644986][b]Happy Good Will Monday[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
The first Monday of June has always been a day celebrated by HF members, but this year Omniscient forgot, hence Goodwill Monday was then celebrated on the second Monday into June.
[/list]
[/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5647021][b]"Not Science"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=50808][b][color=#99FF00]g4143[/color][/b][/url]
An entertaining thread started by user "g4143" with interesting replies as to what is considered to be science and what is not considered to be science.[/list]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5648506][b]"NVO Redflag"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=183072][b][color=white]Mr Kewl[/color][/b][/url]
Another entertaining thread with a video of an interview regarding the NVO team by Coin Interview.[/list]
[/list]

[list][b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5647547][b]"SUMMER GIVEAWAY -----GIVING $5 BTC TO 5 DIFFERENT PEOPLE"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3113723][b][color=#00AAFF]Gangin'[/color][/b][/url]
A generous giveaway by Gangin' who is giving away $5 BTC to 5 different people within the forum.[/list]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5647218][b]"Free Spotify Premium Upgrade Service"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3596957][b][color=#99FF00]Top Shotta[/color][/b][/url]
An amazing giveaway by the user Top Shotta for a free Spotify Premium upgrade.[/list]
[/list]
[list][b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5647602][b]"Fries on Pizza"[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3077324][b][color=white]Maxim[/color][/b][/url]
A random miscellaneous thread by Maxim. This thread illustrates the funny moments and interactions between members within this community.
[/list][/list]

[b][color=white]Stunning Views of Jupiter[/color][/b] 
Juno is NASA's space probe that orbits around the planet Jupiter. Juno was launched back in 2011, and every 53 days, Jupiter's gravity force pulls the probe very close to the planet. Since the summer of last year, Juno has been pulled towards Jupiter around five times. A photo was taken on May 19 of this year, while approaching very close to Jupiter, the space probe was able to capture images of Jupiter's south tropical zone. The images (which will be shown below)  show off beautiful clouds which scientists believe is ammonia ice (basically water ice). These clouds can stretch up to 50 kilometers wide and from the pictures look like a beautiful painting. Ever wanted to know if it snows on Jupiter? Well, it does, and Juno can see when and where it is snowing. Juno can even tell if it is hail or not. One other fascinating about this space probe is the fact that it has the ability to capture images of stars around the huge gas planet. [url=https://i.imgur.com/9Dwi4FZ.jpg]Here[/url] is the picture of Jupiter's south tropical zone. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencenews.org/article/see-latest-stunning-views-jupiter]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cannabis Knocks Back Epilepsy in New Clinical Trial[/color][/b] 
The fight for the legalization of marijuana is a long battle that still goes on today. But for some places in the world, there is no law banning the drug. A recent study was done on a group of kids who have a Dravet syndrome. Basically, this means that the children suffer a very devastating seizure condition. With that being said, researchers reported to The New England Journal of Medicine their experiment. One group of kids were given an oral solution which contained cannabidiol, which is a component found in marijuana. The other group of kids with Dravet syndrome received an oral solution that did not contain it.  The researchers reported that those who took the legitimate oral solution had fewer seizures than the did prior to taking the solution and in total, the seizures were cut down in half producing positive reports. This is all good, however; there were a few negative aspects to those who took the cannabidiol solution. Some kids reported side effects like vomiting. In addition to the bad side effects, eight children had to be removed from the program from the damage caused by their liver enzymes. Is it right to be testing this on children? [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.sciencemag.org/news/sifter/cannabis-knocks-back-epilepsy-new-clinical-trial]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Could This New Compound Give You a Suntan?[/color][/b] 
Ever wanted to get that beautiful tan without the effort of sitting in the Sun? With this brand new compound, humans may do just that. In its current state, the compound has not been tested on humans, only mice and dead patches of skin. The purpose of this is not only to hopefully give you that nice beach body but to help prevent skin cancer that you can get from the harmful rays the Sun emits. Jerod Stapleton, a behavioral scientist at the Rutgers Cancer Institute, says, "We are talking about millions of young people potentially not using tanning beds each year. … It could be a game-changer for skin cancer prevention.” The way this compound would work is the chemicals used in the compound will help shape the melanin making pathway. Applying it to your skin will allow the compound to penetrate through and scientists say that one of their tests was successful. Using human skin taken from surgery, the compound was applied, and a brown blotch was formed on the skin. This shows that the chemicals were successful in reaching the melanocytes. Basically, what spurs up the production of melanin. When viewed under the microscope, the skin cells look natural, compared to a spray tan which can actually kill skin cells and provides no UV protection. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.sciencemag.org/news/2017/06/could-new-compound-give-you-suntan-without-sun]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Paris: Car Carrying Explosives Rams Into Police Van[/color][/b]
Hours after a van plowed into people leaving a London mosque, a car in Paris rammed into a police van while attempting to overtake a police convoy. Driver is dead though there's no offical word on how the driver died. Police found guns and explosives inside the car and have stated that the explosives could've caused a potential blast.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.reuters.com/article/us-france-police-idUSKBN19A1YK] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Tourist Resort in Mali Attacked[/color][/b]
Three gunmen attacked a popular luxury resort in Mali with at least 2 dead. Two of the gunmen are dead with the third missing. Shortly after the attack, special anti-terrorist force arrived at the resort and secured the site. US Embassy has informed US citizens of an increased threat against Westerners visiting locations near Bamako, Mali's capital.[i][size=x-small][url=http://www.cnn.com/2017/06/18/africa/urgent--gunfire-heard-at-mali-tourist-resort/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Russia to Treat US Jets as Potential Targets in Syria[/color][/b]
After yesterday's event of a US jet shooting down a Syrian jet, Russia has warned the US that any plane flying west of the Euphrates river will be a potential target for Russian jets. Russia's deputy foreign minister stated "[the US strike] has to be seen as a continuation of America's line to disregard the norms of international law." After Russian miliary threatended to close down the hotline known as the "deconfliction channel" back in April, US prime minister urged Russia not to close it as it could lead to a potential air fight between Russian and US fighter jets.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/2017/jun/19/russia-target-us-led-coalition-warplanes-over-syria] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]YouTube is Letting Creators See Where People Look During 360-Degree Videos[/color][/b]
YouTube is taking off new analytics tools for 360-degree and VR video makers that will incorporate a warmth guide of where users are looking while at the same time watching those clips. The heat maps, which will be accessible for recordings that surpass 1,000 views, will naturally highlight “what parts of your video are catching a viewer’s attention and how long they’re looking at a specific part of the video.”
This is YouTube's most recent endeavor to enable content creators to figure out how to best use the format and produce immersive experiences. Viewers have various methods for viewing a 360-degree video: you can do as such utilizing a VR headset, swiping around in the YouTube mobile application, or by simply turning a 360-degree video in your desktop web browser. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/6/16/15821738/youtube-360-degree-vr-video-see-where-people-look]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Why Amazon wants to own Whole Foods and sell you groceries[/color][/b]
The online retail Goliath, who has toiled for over 10 years attempting to make online grocery deliveries work, said Friday it has consented to obtain Whole Foods Market for $13.7 billion in cash. The deal anticipated that would shut in the second half of the year, is by a long shot Amazon's greatest securing.
Entire Foods posted income a year ago of about $16 billion, and its shares closed at $33.06 on Thursday. The securing cost was $42, a 27 percent premium. Amazon, whose income a year ago was just under $136 billion, saw its shares rise 3 percent to $994.47 in recent trading. In the meantime, offers of Walmart, Kroger, and Target all sank. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/amazon-to-buy-whole-foods-for-13-7-billion/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]OnePlus 5 Registrations Reaches 3 Lakh Units in Just Two Days[/color][/b]
OnePlus will, at last, declare its OnePlus 5 flagship smartphone all around on June 20. The organization has additionally arranged an event for its China Dispatch on June 21 followed by India launch on June 22. In front of its inception, the smartphone is as of now picking up a considerable measure of footing among online purchasers. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.digit.in/mobile-phones/oneplus-5-registrations-reaches-3-lakh-units-in-just-two-days-report-35652.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]What Pokemon Will Appear During Pokemon Go's Solstice Event?[/color][/b] 
Before you ask, "Is this game still alive?" And to answer your question, yes! Pokemon Go is still going strong despite the lack of people who talk about the game. Believe it or not; people still play it. It is still widely popular, and every so often Niantic does their best to reward those who play by offering awesome rewards. For example, the introduction of the shiny Magikarp and allowing players to get water Pokemon more frequently.  Pokemon Go will be hosting a new event for its players called the Solstice event. In this event, you will have the chance to get a lot of cool spawns. One being the fire-lizard Charizard. One Pokemon that will not be obtainable by eggs and only this event is the generation two Pokemon, Houndoom. Of course, you will need to get a Houndour first to build up candies to evolve into Houndoom but the chances of getting one is very uncommon, Niantic says. [i][size=x-small][url=http://comicbook.com/gaming/2017/06/10/pokemon-go-fire-ice-event-spawn-list]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Zelda Breath Of The Wild DLC[/color][/b] 
With E3 came the release of many different trailers that excited gamers all across the globe. New games for the Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch were announced, and many games people have been anticipating to know more about were showcased. If you enjoyed playing one of the most popular Nintendo Switch Zelda Breath of the Wild, then there is good news coming your way about new DLC. Described as a new play mode with new armor and challenges to participate in, you are definitely going to be out of breath. Alright, ignore that horrible pun but with the new DLC comes this new game mode that has been named "Master Mode".  In short, this new game mode makes it a lot harder and opens up your playstyle to new horizons. What that means is your stealth skills will need to be on par, and your chance of getting killed is a lot higher in this mode. If you have not completed the game, do not worry. This option is available at all times. Just one catch; you are making a new save. The DLC comes out June 30 and is one out of the two Breath of the Wild DLC's being released. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/e3-2017-zelda-breath-of-the-wild-dlc-the-master-tr/1100-6451010/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]20,000 Sign OpenIV Petition as GTA 5 Is Hammered With Negative Steam Reviews[/color][/b] 
Fans of GTA V modding are furious with Take-Two's decision to shut down a very popular modding tool used widely by the GTA modding community leaves gamers in shambles. Many of the furious modders are taking their anger out on the GTA V Steam review pages. In the past week, over 23,000 reviews were made. Of the 23,000, 21% were positive reviews. Not only are these reviews being left to bring back the tool, but a petition was made, and over 20,000 people have signed it. To give an estimate of how many people were using the tool before the shutdown, over 10,000 modders are being affected. One of the most popular mod was the LSPDFR which was the police mod that allowed players to become a cop and transformed the game to a law enforcement simulator. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/20000-sign-openiv-petition-as-gta-5-is-hammered-with-negative-steam-reviews/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
